title: Imprint = L'Empreinte
creator_credit: International Film Promotions, Jacques Armand Cardon and Henri Lacam
brief_description: Animated philosophical tale about the moulding of children into a social pattern. Futuristic piece which suggests that society will consist of two classes - the rulers and the ruled. Suitable for upper secondary level.
creator_credit_for_label: International Film Promotions, Jacques Armand Cardon and Henri Lacam
